Title: The Adventures of Bullwhip Griffin
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Romance, Western
Writer: Lowell S. Hawley (screenplay), Albert Sidney Fleischman (novel)
Actors: Roddy McDowall, Suzanne Pleshette, Karl Malden, Harry Guardino
Plot: A young man from Boston heads west to join the California gold rush with the hopes of restoring his family fortune, but his dedicated butler sets out to find him and bring him home.
